name: Homer J. Simpson
about: Award-winning nuclear safety inspector with 20 years' experience, plus additional skills as policechief, bartender, astronaut, snowplow driver, sports team mascot, and uhhh, is that a box ofdonuts? MmmmmmDOOOnuts!

workexperiences.title: Springfield Nuclear Power Plant, Springfield, USA
highlights: Strengthened safety procedures that resulted in 75% fewer accidents on days I was absent.
Pioneered workplace stress-reduction methods that worked for at least one employee.

workexperiences.title: City of Springfield, Springfield, USA
highlights: Secured community support in almost-successful effort to expel organized crime from city.

workexperiences.title: Moe's Tavern and Homer's Hunting Club, Springfield, USA
highlights: Engaged patrons in witty, whimsical, avuncular dialog covering topics such as the arts,philosophy, politics, and spectator sports.
Launched remodeling project that led to 100% reduction in clientele (including myself).

workexperiences.title: National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA), Cape Canaveral, FL
highlights: Averted in-flight disaster by forcing giant ants out of cockpit during space shuttle mission.

workexperiences.title: Mr. Plow, Springfield, USA
workexperiences.desc: Owner, Chief Marketing Officer, and Chief Driver for Snow-Plowing Business
highlights: Boosted business 15% by executing late-night TV marketing campaign targeting homeowners who were too wasted to shovel their driveways.
Deliberated at length before rescuing man trapped beneath mountain avalanche.
